title: Cease and Desist: Factor Bikes Sparks Controversy with Its Scarab-Themed Road Bike
content:
Colombian frame builder Scarab Cycles says a limited edition Factor bike has caused confusion among consumers.

Read the full article at Cease and Desist: Factor Bikes Sparks Controversy with Its Scarab-Themed Road Bike on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
